welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mountain House, where the tranquil beauty of nature meets small-town charm. Known for its breathtaking mountain views and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for shipping and receiving cargo.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Executive Airport offers exclusive services for private and corporate aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Terminal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Air Terminal Airport, primarily used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
